description:
* 2 BR- Private bathroom and kitchen.
* 20-min train rides to midtown Manhattan. 20 min to JFK and 12 min LaGuardia
* 2minute walk to Restaurants, shopping centers (Target, Macy’s, DSW, Red Lobster etc), supermarkets, subways (R, M trains) and buses (Q53 and Q58). 
* Private parking ($10 dollars per night), Free for guests staying 7 day
*Unit located on second floor 
* Very Comfortable three Queen size beds
*The kitchen is stocked with pots, pans, and utensils.
name: 2BR- Private Kitchen + Bathroom-20min to Manhattan
review: Michelle & Eddie's house is very convenient as it locates very close to subway station, grocery store, take-out  restaurants,etc. and are great host . My family really enjoyed our stay !
